Armor.name: Amber Earrings
Armor.Description: One of the items sold by the Gerudo jeweler. These earrings are made with amber, a gem that harnesses the power of the land to increase defense when equipped.

Armor.name: Ancient Hero's Aspect
Armor.Description: This item is said to contain the spirit of a hero who once saved Hyrule. That hero's aura will envelop the wearer.

Armor.name: Archaic Tunic
Armor.Description: Old-fashioned upper-body wear. It's got some holes, but the soft cloth feels good to the touch. It's hard to keep it wrinkle-free.

Armor.name: Archaic Legwear
Armor.Description: Simple, classic legwear. They're well-worn and showing their age, but they've still got a few good years left in them. It can be a bit cumbersome to have to tie the straps.

Armor.name: Archaic Warm Greaves
Armor.Description: Warm greaves believed to be from a very long time ago. Despite the old look, the heat-retaining material makes it pleasantly resistant to cold temperatures.

Armor.name: Bokoblin Mask
Armor.Description: Kilton's handmade Bokoblin headgear. It's almost charming in a cute, monstrous kind of way... Equip it to blend in with Bokoblins.

Armor.name: Cap of Time
Armor.Description: According to legend, this cap was once worn by a hero who traveled through time. A truly timeless item perfect for kids and adults alike!

Armor.name: Cece's Hat
Armor.Description: An avant-garde masterpiece designed by Cece. Guaranteed to make the fashionistas' heads turn.

Armor.name: Champion's Leathers
Armor.Description: This garment, worn by those in good standing with Hyrule royalty, has been reworked with the latest improvements, such as a new shoulder guard.
Armor.PassiveBonus: Grants Link the ability to shoot sword beams with the Master Sword without full health

Armor.name: Mask of Awakening
Armor.Description: Legend says this mask resembles a hero who explored a mysterious place that one could visit but not leave.

Armor.name: Trousers of Awakening
Armor.Description: Legend says these trousers were worn by a hero who explored a mysterious island that one could visit but not leave.

Armor.name: Tunic of Awakening
Armor.Description: Legend says this armor was worn by a hero who explored a mysterious area that one could visit but not leave.
